links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (PARI) a(n)=sum(k=0, 2*n+1, (binomial(2*n+1, k)%2)<<k) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 08 2013(PARI) A011371(n)=my(s);while(n>>=1,s+=n);sA047999(n,k)=A011371(n)==A011371(k)+A011371(n-k)a(n)=n+=n+1;sum(k=0, n, A047999(n, k)<<k) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 09 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
